test-suite:
Test suite for "butter" project on UNIX like operating systems.
This suite tests building C++ projects.
Note that we make the following assumptions about the set up of the project: * The C++ extensions used are hpp/cpp * The output directory is "output" in the project directory * Build dir is "build" and install dir is "install_dir" %(build-style)s output patch
